name: The Last Piece of Bacon
detailed_description:
You play Jimmy Rustle, protecting the world's most valuable asset: disgusting pigs. The last hope for humanity is your protection of any and all piggies in the area. The Last Piece of Bacon tips a hat to the golden age of arcade video games while staying fresh and modern.

Expect a moderately large world, riddled with zombies and bad guys. Praise be to the gunslinger. Lining up your shots perfectly makes survival a lot easier during an apocalypse. If all else fails, grab your shotgun and GET 'ER DONE partner! Good luck!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1 Channel Audio Card
